title: How Seamless Duty Refund Works
description: Reclaim what’s yours – Effortlessly recover Customs duties with Trade Duty Refund.

step1.title: Choose TDR as Your Broker of Choice.
step1.description: Inform your current carriers to designate TDR as your preferred export and import broker.

step2.title: We Handle Carrier Connections.
step2.description: If not already linked with your carrier, TDR will establish the necessary data exchange to manage clearances.

step3.title: Keep Shipping – We Do the Rest.
step3.description: Ship as usual while TDR manages inbound and outbound clearances, reclaiming duties at every opportunity.
